name: CORONALYPSE
description:
Survive from the apocalypse due to the covid-19 pandemic. Get your shotgun and defend yourself from the contaminated people. Use the masks on the floor to reduce your contamination level.  

COLLECT ALL THE VACCINES TO BE A SURVIVOR OF THE PANDEMIC!

Version 0.1:

  • Game only in spanish.
  • May contain some bugs. (In-game options button doesn't work)

Stay tuned for upcoming updates!

Leave me ideas for future updates!
